abstraction_fitness.description: Python abstraction fitness: favor direct modules and explicit domain APIs over indirection layers.
look_for: Functions that only forward args/kwargs to another function without policy or translation
Protocol/base-class abstractions with one concrete implementation and no extension pressure
Over-broad dict/config/context parameters used as implicit parameter bags
Utility modules mixing filesystem, parsing, and domain business logic in one helper surface
skip: Django/FastAPI framework boundaries that require adapters or dependency hooks
Wrappers that add retries, metrics, auth checks, caching, or tracing
Compatibility shims during active migration with explicit owner and removal plan

system_prompt_append: Python anchor checks: pass-through wrappers using *args/**kwargs, one-implementation Protocol patterns, and implicit dict-based context bags.
